abstract: Tripoli Journal; Dr Feisel Krekshi, new dean of Tripoli University, faces task of creating atmosphere far different from tense, ideology-driven learning that pervaded Libya's premier institute of higher education under Col Muammar el-Qaddafi.
snippet: The new dean of Tripoli University faces the task of creating an atmosphere far different from the tense, ideology-driven learning that had pervaded Libya’s premier institute of higher education.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: The new dean of Tripoli University faces the task of creating an atmosphere far different from the tense, ideology-driven learning that had pervaded Libya’s premier institute of higher education.

headline.main: Libyans Hope to Discard a University’s Dark Past
headline.print_headline: Libyans Hope to Discard A University’s Dark Past
headline.seo: In Libya, Tripoli University Awaits a Post-Qaddafi Rebirth
